name: Experimental
notes: Very likely to change or be removed

name: Authoritative source
description: The organisation is the authoritative source of this data
notes: Authoratitive source for data not bound by planning data specifications

name: Prospective data
description: The organisation is responsible for data covered by this prospective specification
notes: We are piloting this specification for provison by this type of organisation.

name: Expected data
description: The organisation should provide data as a member of the project developing the specification
notes: We have funded or otherwise have an agreement for the organisation to provide this data

name: Encouraged data
description: The organisation is encouraged to provide data to this standard
notes: There is a data standard but it is not a requirement to provide data

name: Statutory data
description: The organisation has a statutory duty to provide data to this standard
